BIO

My name is Viktor. I am a Full Stack web developer with experience at building websites and web applications. I specialize in native JavaScript, and Bootstrap. I am a goal oriented, enthusiastic, self-driven and always evolving novice developer seeking for a fulltime position. Every day I try to learn new things, wether it is IT related or something different (sport, music, psychology etc.). Through my career path in different fields I have obtained a lot of general skills (patience, stress resistance, self management etc.) that would be useful on almost any position and on position of Front-End developer in particular.
